Posts.Content: Congrats to you on finishin up with radiation. I too had experience a bitter sweet moment when I finished last Friday. I cried and hugged everyone. But now onto healing and feeling better. Take Care. Jenifer
Posts.Title: Another Rad Grad Today...YEA !!!

Posts.Content: Yes it has been really cold out in the Pacific Northwest as well. It has finally warmed up to above freezing. Where areÂ you in Maine? I have a sister who lives in Moody. I hope that you get to feeling better during your 2 weeks off of chemo. I have been reading your posts and you are one very strong and determined Woman. I really admire that! Merry Christmas Jenifer
Posts.Title: SIROD, how are you doing?
